column5: What does the "Mulit +" button do? It's beside the "quote & top buttons" at the bottom of each response.
Multi allows you to quote several posts within a thread at once. usually reserved for heated discussions. Click each one you want to quote then hit Add Reply.
A really cool function that saves alot of time when youre trying to flame as many people as possible!    joking...somewhat
Is there anything this board won't do?  Oh... right, set the damn hook!!

I am anticipating that in version 4.36 that this board will indeed set the hook gfor ya...  In version 5.78 (TJQ mod) it will even cook your fish for you... look for this particluar mod at next years Lakair G2G
This is a funny thread. LOL
